title: Obedient Cat
description: This file has a flag in plain sight (aka "in-the-clear")
hint: Try to read the content from file

title: Mod 26
description: Cryptography can be easy, do you know what ROT13 is? cvpbPGS{arkg_gvzr_V'yy_gel_2_ebhaqf_bs_ebg13_MAZyqFQj}
hint: This can be solved online if you don't want to do it by hand!

title: Tab, Tab, Attack
description: Using tab-complete in the Terminal will add years to your life, especially when dealing with long, rambling directory structures and filenames like Addadshashanammu.zip.
hint: After `unzip`ing, this problem can be solved with 11 button-presses...(mostly Tab)...

title: Inspect HTML
description: Can you get the flag? Open a new Tab, Go to this website and see what you can discover. website: 'http://saturn.picoctf.net:64200/'
hint: What is the web inspector in web browsers?

title: The Number
description: The numbers... what do they mean?
hint: How many letters are in the English alphabet?

title: PW Crack
description: Can you crack the password to get the flag? Download the password checker and you'll need the encrypted flag in the same directory too.
hint: The str_xor function does not need to be reverse engineered for this challenge. Does that encoding look familiar?

title: Matryoshka doll
description: Matryoshka dolls are a set of wooden dolls of decreasing size placed one inside another. What's the final one? Download the image
hint: Wait, you can hide files inside files? But how do you find them?

title: Glory of the Garden
description: This garden contains more than it seems.
